titleStmt.title: Description of American Philosophical Society, Mss 494.9 T841: Tercüman-nâme. / Tajumān nāmah. / ترجمان نامه

msContents.summary: Letter templates for a variety of circumstances; includes table of contents (f. 3v-4r).

support.watermark: Shield with crescent moon with face in profile (Abū Shubbāk)

layoutDesc.layout: Written in 15 long lines; catchwords every verso, lower left; ruled with a misṭarah.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in late ruqʻah in black; pointed, unvocalized.

binding.p: Bound in quarter covers with modern, marbled cardboard sides.

history.provenance: Deposited with American Philosophical Society by John Porter Brown 19 February 1836 (note in ink, f. 1r).
